name: key#1

name: magicbox
description: Small box that is sealed shut with some kind of magic, who knows that's inside

name: chainmailshirt
description: Chain mail is a type of armour consisting of small metal rings linked together in a pattern to form a mesh. It was generally in common military use between the 3rd century BC and the 14th century AD. A coat of this armour is often referred to as a hauberk, and sometimes a byrnie.
